file_content.text: Emperor Valkorion talks to you, right? He have any advice?
He's giving me the silent treatment.
Not at the moment, no.
He's probably got a lot on your mind.
He has opinions about everything. I'm getting tired of it.
Constantly. It's annoying.
You should feel honored he cares so much.
He's very annoyed it's taking so long to hot-wire that speeder.
[Lie] He says to hurry up.
Fine, don't tell me. I'm just saying....
The Emperor is a great man. If anyone can help you take down Arcann, it's him.
His power comes at a high price. I won't be in debt to him.
I don't want his help.
Debts can be paid. Do what's best for the galaxy.
If you knew what I do about him, you'd run. The man killed billions.
You hero-worship a monster.
He was always good to Zakuul.
We're talking about it right now. I wish you could hear us.
[Lie] We're working on a plan.
When you two hit Arcann, I plan to be there.
Reminder: The Gravestone remains under siege.
Everyone's a critic!
You're free from your father's control. You don't have to serve Arcann. You can stop this mad war.
We didn't follow when you left Father. Why would we listen to you now?
I don't want to hurt you.
I liked you better when you were dead.
Haha....
The main override control station's just ahead.
Whatever happens, I want you to know... it's an honor to fight alongside you.
I know I complain sometimes, but you've done good so far. Keep it up.
You're not the easiest person to work with, Outlander, but I've got your back.
Follow me. I'll get you through this alive.
Stay close. We're a team.
You stole my battle cry.
Careful, Koth. You'll make me blush.
[Flirt] Flatterer.
This is why I don't give compliments.
Just do your part and keep staying out of my way.
Don't fail me.
Inspiring words. Really.
Let's find that droid.
We've learned to combine our powers. All we need now is to focus them on Arcann.
We're working out a plan.
Save me a front-row seat for that.
This will get us where we need to go. Let's see if we can get it fired up.
